name: FluxCP - Hercules
body: Flux Control Panel for Hercules is a fork of popular and versatile FluxCP, updated to work with [Hercules server](http://hercules.ws). #### Requirements * PHP 5.2 * PDO and PDO-MYSQL extensions for PHP5 (including PHP_MYSQL support) * MySQL 5 * Optional: GD2 (for guild emblems and registration CAPTCHA) * Optional: Tidy (for cleaner HTML output) * Optional: mod_rewrite support for UseCleanUrls feature #### Downloads Download zip/tar archive of lastest snapshot or checkout directly from Git/Subversion repository (links at the top of the page). #### Documentation For installation instructions visit project [Wiki](https://github.com/HerculesWS/FluxCP/wiki). #### Forums * http://hercules.ws/board/topic/1901-flux-control-panel-for-hercules/
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
